Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black (mostly worn); exterior: painted decoration consisting of bull (rump remaining; with added red patches) to right; dot rosette and part of other rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0534) (phase 2)
